EmailTemplate.name: MD_EMSToday_0301.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Going to EMS Today? Stop by and visit us at Booth #3512
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
2012 EMS Today Booth #3512 | March 1-3 | Baltimore, MD
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}},
Stop by and see us at the 2012 EMS Today conference, booth #3512, and meet Regional Sales Manager, Larry Cole, Product Manager, Charlie Barry and Product Specialist, James Howard.
Schedule a demonstration to view our Sweet Billing, Fusion ePCR or VisiCAD solutions. We have options for online or installed applications.
SCHEDULE A PRODUCT DEMO AT EMS TODAY: http://offers.tritech.com/MD_EMSToday_0301_RegisterforDemo.html
Can't make the conference? That's okay. Call us at 800.537.3927
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION Need NAAC credits? http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp Find out more about all the NAAC-Certified Webinar Recordings we offer to help your office improve their knowledge and skills, and get their CEUs!
EMS industry experts predict that in the future, integrated, web-based EMS solutions will become the industry standard. TriTech offers these solutions NOW - read more here: http://www.tritechems.com/Products/online.asp
TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road, San Diego, CA 92121 info@tritech.com
